name: Patient 9 v236 Beta
description:
A survival horror game about an amnesiac patient in a mental asylum trying to find out his past. Crazed Patients and Doctors stand in his way.

Controls are: W, A, S, D to move, CAPS to sprint. J to talk/confirm, I to open inventory, J to use.

Typewriters save your progress, just walk up to them and hit J. You can load from the Title Screen.

More information at: https://alexneufeldt.blogspot.com/search/label/Patient%209

Still in Beta Development.
